title: Strengthening AI Competencies: CPI Pedagogy for Enhancing Scientific Literacy of Pre-Service Physics Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of general physics and basic understanding of pedagogy
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply core knowledge required to scientifically explain physical phenomena with 80% or higher accuracy.
Learners can systematically structure scientific inquiry design and evaluation criteria through three or more hands-on practice sessions.
Learners can write reports presenting scientific evidence by interpreting experimental data, following the CPI stages (Composition-Production-Implementation).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
